ygData.subject: Re: Cast Force
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummn No, i am a lvl 35 wizard, you cant buy it, you have to make it through research, i made it and it only does 101 at my lvl, i beleive this is max dmg.

Ummn No, i am a lvl 35 wizard, you cant buy it, you have to make it through
research, i made it and it only does 101 at my lvl, i beleive this is max
dmg.
